name: Fabrizio Romano Genovese
description: I am a quantum scientist and a mechanism designer. I am part of [20squares.xyz](https://20squares.xyz), a mechanism design consulting company that is principally active in the field of economic simulations, game theory, incentive and MEV research. I am also  part of the [QSigCommission](https://github.com/The-QSig-Commission/), an organization devoted to the study and implementation of quantum 1-shot signatures. I am also one of the organizers of [napulETH](https://napul.eth.limo).
